scan_qr_description: Scan QR codes to quickly access shortened links.
shorten_link_description: Shorten your links to share them more easily.
register_description: Register to experience our services at
forgot_password_description: Enter your email and we'll send you instructions to reset your password.
reset_password_description: Fill in the fields below to reset your password.
upload_qr_description: Click or drag to upload your QR image.
decode_qr_error: Failed to decode QR. Please try another image.
decode_qr_description: Here is the link from your QR code. Click the button below to access it.
scan_qr_code_description: Turn on your camera and scan a QR code to access links quickly.
cannot_detect_qr_code: Cannot detect QR code. Please try again.
camera_permission_denied: Camera access denied. Please grant permission to use this feature.
shorten_link_success: Link shortened successfully. Below is your QR code and shortened link.
download_qr_error: Failed to download QR image. Please try again.
get_link_pw_description: This link is protected. Please enter the password to access.
confirm_delete_description: To confirm deletion, please enter "{{requiredText}}" below.
update_url_description: Update the URL information below. Leave password empty if you don’t want to protect the link.
no_urls: No links have been created yet.
login_feature_unlimited_time: No time limit for link expiration.
guest_feature_history: QR scan history is not saved.
guest_feature_2weeks: Shortened links are accessible for 2 weeks only.
login_now_description: Log in now to use all our features.
